Publications

2018

  • Totally Ordered Replication for Massive Scale Key-Value Stores. Ribeiro J, Machado N, Maia F, Matos M. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

2017

  • HTAPbench: Hybrid Transactional and Analytical Processing Benchmark. Coelho F, Paulo J, Vilaça R, Pereira J, Oliveira R. ACM/SPEC International Conference on Performance Engineering (ICPE).
  • A Practical Framework for Privacy-Preserving NoSQL Databases. Macedo R, Paulo J, Pontes R, Portela B, Oliveira T, Matos M, Oliveira R. IEEE International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems (SRDS).
  • Performance trade-offs on a secure multi-party relational database. Pontes R, Pinto M, Barbosa M , Vilaça R, Matos M, Oliveira R.. ACM Symposium on Applied Computing (SAC).
  • Similarity Aware Shuffling for the Distributed Processing of SQL Window Functions. Coelho F, Matos M, Pereira J, Oliveira R. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).
  • DDFlasks: Deduplicated Very Large Scale Data Store. Maia F, Paulo J, Coelho F, Neves F, Pereira J, Oliveira R. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

2016

  • SafeRegions: Performance Evaluation of Multi-party Protocols on HBase. Pontes R, Maia F, Paulo J, Vilaça R. IEEE International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems Workshops (SRDSW).
  • Holistic Shuffler for the Parallel Execution of SQL Window Functions. Coelho F, Pereira J, Vilaça R, Oliveira R. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

2015

  • Implementing a Linear Algebra Approach to Data Processing. Pontes R, Matos M, Oliveira J, Pereira J. Grand Timely Topics (Generative and Transformational Techniques) in Software Engineering (GTTSE).

2013

  • MeT: workload aware elasticity for NoSQL . Cruz F, Maia F, Matos M, Oliveira R, Paulo J, Pereira J, Vilaça R. Proceedings of the 8th ACM European Conference on Computer Systems (EuroSys).

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
